title: A steep climb, but excellent views
text: Views from this place are amazing. Best in Athens. Lovely streets filled with orange trees as you walk to the hill. Took the cable car on the way down. Would recommend to take it one way. One car every 30 mins, not sure if the service is more frequent in summer. Must see place in Athens!

title: interesting place, good vibe
text: Nice place to rest after ling walks. Good shops around with street performers on weekends. As usual, keep watch of your pockets. Although we didn't experience any issues ourselves.

title: must see for a sports fan
text: Didn't expect that we would see much when we were outside. Was pleasantly surprised when we got in. Great view from the top of the stadium and decent audio guide included with the entry ticket. Have to pay for the toilets outside though. Overall a great experience as I love athletics too.

title: Amazing place
text: Lot of history and well maintained area. We were there in the off peak season, hence took couple of minutes to buy the ticket and get in. Was told it takes couple of hours to get in during summer. Still was busy inside considering it was late Nov. Must see if you like history and want good views of Athens.

title: Curry night
text: Ordered curry from Jai Ho to cater for a large group in our church. The food was amazing! Received lots of positive feedback from many people. Thank you team Jai Ho for your professional catering services.
place: Jai Ho at The Coppingham Arms

title: Excellent food
text: Had a reunion with former mates at Jail ho one Saturday afternoon. Food was great. Table reserved and service was good. Ample parking space.
place: Jai Ho at The Coppingham Arms

title: Must see, go in the morning
text: Great views from the top of this hill, the steps leading to this were well maintained and we saw couple of police officers keeping guard midway. Overall a good view point for Antigua.

title: Good location
text: First time visitor. Great location to get to the beach. Decent continental breakfast. Clean rooms. I would recommend for a couple of days visit. It's not a far from Jerusalem by road. 1 hour max. Tel-Aviv is a vibrant city.

title: Superb Food and atmosphere
text: Always love the food from Jai Ho. A big fan and think its one good authentic Indian restaurant in the area.
place: Jai Ho at The Coppingham Arms

title: A good one day tour
text: We had only a day in Slovenia and took the option of the tour. Our guide Nina was punctual, knowledgeable and spoke very good English. We got dropped at our preferred location and she helped us in deciding traditional dishes. Overall a good tour, and happy that we chose Slovenia Explorer.

title: Lively town
text: Beautiful European Town. Excellent local food. Would definitely visit it once more if I get a chance.

title: Good Location
text: The rooms were of small size, but we didn't mind that as we just needed to spend 2 nights there, Very good location, 5 minutes walk from St. Joseph's gate. The staff at reception were friendly and helpful. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a decent place.
